item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: webincorp
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: https://www.noir.qa.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: webincorp
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1626755095142{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #0a0a0a !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

About Cafe Noir

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1626755072470{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 10% !important;}"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Established in 2017 and rebranded in 2020, Café Noir is your new favourite destination for coffee. Located in the luxurious: Al Hazm and West Walk - Café Noir is a place where you want to be not only to enjoy our inviting atmosphere, hand-crafted coffee and pastries made by the best chefs from Europe but also to take a break.

Get your phones ready, Instagram and Snapchat are calling.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1626755108166{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1626755135154{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"]

Why people choose us?

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="663" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_column_text]

Menu for every taste

Café noir is a place where highly refined gourmet roasted coffees, pastries and food are of the best quality.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="664" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_column_text]

Best Ambiance

Café Noir is located at the most luxurious places in Doha – Al Hazm and West Walk. It is definitely a perfect location because of its great indoor and outdoor architectural design, not to mention a very seasonal-friendly environment for both the summer and winter.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="665" img_size="full" alignment="center"][vc_column_text]

Experienced Chefs

Rounding out the simplest yet exquisite and contemporary lineup of pastries and food choices obtained true the passionate and excellent local chefs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_images_carousel images="154,155,158,156,159,157" img_size="full" slides_per_view="3" hide_pagination_control="yes"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:

A coffee place for every season:

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1677142586993{margin-top: 0px !important;}"]

Welcome to Café Noir located in one of the most iconic places in Doha: Al Hazm & West Walk

Welcome to a place that defines its destination. Welcome to care, to refinement, to everything your heart desires. With love, welcome to Café Noir. Don’t forget to take a picture with our teddy bears. Don’t worry even during summer we have outdoor AC to keep our polar friends and yourself cold and happy.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1627549179270{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1627549083500{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

A filtered brewed hot coffee made from single-origin coffee beans dripped using a special V60 dripper, creating a bold, rich and smooth coffee of choice![\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\"][vc_single_image image=\"1047\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397745131{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Geisha<\/h3>

Geisha coffee beans \u2013 one of the finest and rarest coffee beans in the world, roasted it\u2019s roasted in one of the best roasteries in the world, which is in Italy. Specifically ordered by Caf\u00e9 Noir for coffee lovers and enthusiasts, alike![\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=\"1\/3\"][\/vc_column_inner][\/vc_row_inner][\/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=\"NOIR COLD BEVERAGE\" tab_id=\"1626777828387-e71f2e3a-11e5\"][vc_row_inner equal_height=\"yes\" gap=\"35\" css=\".vc_custom_1626847168683{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626847155952{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"328\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397926159{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Iced Spanish Latte<\/h3>

An iced espresso-based drink with normal and sweetened condensed milk. It\u2019s slightly sweeter than a normal latte. Topped with whipped cream.[\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799418914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"329\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397938406{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Iced Caramel Latte<\/h3>

An iced caramel\u2013flavoured caf\u00e9 latte, made with an espresso shot, steamed milk, and caramel. Topped with whipped cream and sea salt caramel.[\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799429706{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"330\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397950311{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Iced Noir Rose<\/h3>

An iced rose\u2013flavoured caf\u00e9 latte, made with an espresso shot, steamed milk, rosewater, rose syrup, and vanilla. Topped with whipped cream.[\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][\/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=\"yes\" gap=\"35\" css=\".vc_custom_1626847174754{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799391234{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"333\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397963106{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Lotus Special Latte<\/h3>

A rich and creamy blended drink that comes with coffee, Lotus biscuits, vanilla, and ice. Topped with whipped cream. [\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799418914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"334\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397974928{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Banana Smoothie<\/h3>

A rich and silky blended drink made with fresh bananas, vanilla, and ice. Topped with fresh banana slices. [\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799429706{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"335\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397986506{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Strawberry Smoothie<\/h3>

A light and creamy blended drink made with fresh strawberries, vanilla, and ice. Garnished with fresh strawberry. [\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][\/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=\"yes\" gap=\"35\" css=\".vc_custom_1626847181469{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}\"][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799391234{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"338\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665397999322{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Chocolate Frappuccino<\/h3>

A smooth and rich blended drink that consists of chocolate frappe powder, fresh vanilla, and a shot of espresso. Topped with whipped cream and cocoa powder. [\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=\"menu_box1\" width=\"1\/3\" css=\".vc_custom_1626799418914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}\"][vc_single_image image=\"336\" img_size=\"full\"][vc_column_text css=\".vc_custom_1665398011021{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}\"]<\/p>

Caramel Frappucino<\/h3>

A sweet and velvety blended drink made with sea salt caramel sauce, vanilla, and an espresso shot. Topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of sea salt caramel.[\/vc_column_text][\/vc_column_inner][\/vc_row_inner][\/vc_tta_section][\/vc_tta_tabs][\/vc_column][\/vc_row][vc_row full_width=\"stretch_row_content_no_spaces\" css=\".vc_custom_1627550619789{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;background-color: #0a0a0a !important;}\"][vc_column][vc_btn title=\"Download Full Menu\" style=\"outline-custom\" outline_custom_color=\"#ffffff\" outline_custom_hover_background=\"#666666\" outline_custom_hover_text=\"#666666\" shape=\"round\" align=\"center\" link=\"url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.noir.qa%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2021%2F07%2FCafe-Noir.pdf|title:Download%20Full%20menu|target:_blank\"][\/vc_column][\/vc_row]<\/p>"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Noir Apple Tart
item.dc:creator: noir
item.content:encoded:
At our Café Noir, we take pride in not only serving delicious coffee, but also in providing mouthwatering desserts that contribute to a special dining experience. Our desserts are made fresh daily. Whether you're looking for a quick snack or a delicious dessert to enjoy with your coffee, we've got you covered.

Our latest addition to the menu is the traditional French Apple Tart, that combines the sweetness of apples with a crunchy pastry. It is perfect to end a meal, have it as a snack, or to celebrate any occasion. This dish is made by flaking apple slices and then placing them on top of a blonde, crispy crust made from flour, butter, and milk.

The Apple Tart at Café Noir is every bit as Instagrammable as any other dessert that we make. Prepare your phones now so you can be the first customer to capture this delectable Apple Tart in a snap.

We know that you will love it as much as we do!

item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
We are proud to participate in the largest global event “Longines Global Champions Tour 2023” 2023 edition in Doha, Qatar.

Enjoy watching the Global champions & their horses directly from the balcony of Café Noir and enjoy the best taste of coffee specially imported from the best international roasters in Italy

item.title: An Exquisite & Unparalleled Taste - Pain Perdu
item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to embark on a sweet journey as we introduce our latest masterpiece: Crème Brûlée! 🍮✨

This delectable dessert isn't just a treat for your taste buds; it's a celebration of flavor, texture, and artistry. Crafted with the utmost care and the finest ingredients, our Crème Brûlée is a true labor of love.

Imagine breaking through a crisp, caramelized sugar crust to reveal the velvety custard beneath – it's a moment of pure indulgence. And yes, it's Instagram-worthy, but more importantly, it's a dessert that's meant to be savored and enjoyed.

Whether you're marking a special occasion or simply craving a touch of luxury, our Crème Brûlée is here to delight your senses. Come, experience the magic for yourself, and elevate your dessert game with every unforgettable bite. 🍰✨

item.title: Best Coffee House in Qatar 2023
item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
We are thrilled to announce that Café Noir has been awarded the prestigious Fact Magazine Award for Best Coffee House in Qatar 2023.

This recognition is a testament to the exceptional quality, luxury, and unparalleled coffee experience that Café Noir has consistently provided to its esteemed clientele. Let's dive into why Café Noir has emerged as the top coffee destination in Qatar.

Café Noir takes pride in creating a luxurious and inviting atmosphere for its patrons. From the moment you step through our doors, you are enveloped in an ambience that exudes elegance and sophistication. Our skilled baristas at Café Noir are not only masters of their craft but also passionate ambassadors of the coffee experience. Our warm and attentive service ensures that every visit to Café Noir is memorable.

item.title: Artisanal Ice Cream by NOIR: Coming Soon
item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
Artisanal Ice Cream by NOIR Coming Soon!

Get ready to embark on a journey of flavor that will redefine your ice cream expectations. Café Noir is thrilled to announce the upcoming launch of Artisanal Ice Cream by NOIR. Our culinary artisans have meticulously crafted a symphony of flavors designed to delight your senses and transport you to a realm of exquisite taste. From classic favorites to innovative creations, each scoop is a masterpiece in itself. Stay tuned for this exciting revelation that will transform your dessert experience. Take your palate to new heights with NOIR's Artisanal Ice Cream!

item.title: Crème Brûlée: A Unique Experience
item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to embark on a sweet journey as we introduce our latest masterpiece: Crème Brûlée!

This delectable dessert isn't just a treat for your taste buds; it's a celebration of flavor, texture, and artistry. Crafted with the utmost care and the finest ingredients, our Crème Brûlée is a true labor of love.

Imagine breaking through a crisp, caramelized sugar crust to reveal the velvety custard beneath – it's a moment of pure indulgence. And yes, it's Instagram-worthy, but more importantly, it's a dessert that's meant to be savored and enjoyed.

Whether you're marking a special occasion or simply craving a touch of luxury, our Crème Brûlée is here to delight your senses. Come, experience the magic for yourself, and elevate your dessert game with every unforgettable bite.

item.title: Culinary Excellence with Noir Cafe's NOIR Cookies
item.dc:creator: antonie
item.content:encoded:
Discover Culinary Excellence with Noir Cafe's NOIR Cookies

We’re excited to unveil our latest culinary masterpiece – the exquisite NOIR cookies. These delightful cookies represent a perfect blend of artistry and flavor, designed to elevate your sweet moments to an entirely new level. Each NOIR cookie is a testament to the craftsmanship and dedication that goes into creating exceptional desserts. These cookies offer a symphony of flavors, with every bite delivering a delightful balance of sweetness and texture. It's not just a cookie; it's an indulgent experience.

Now Available in Sets

To make these delectable treats even more accessible, we're pleased to offer NOIR cookies in 9 and 24 piece sets. Whether you're looking for a personal indulgence or a gift that will leave a lasting impression, these sets are the ideal choice.

The Perfect Gift

NOIR cookies are an excellent choice for special occasions. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or a simple gesture of appreciation, our NOIR cookies in elegant sets make for a thoughtful and delicious surprise.

Find Them at Noir Cafe

You can experience the magic of NOIR cookies right here at Noir Cafe. We take pride in offering an array of delightful treats, and NOIR cookies are no exception. When you visit Noir Cafe, you're not just enjoying a dessert; you're savoring a moment of pure culinary delight.

Don't miss out on this culinary journey. The extraordinary flavors of Noir Cafe's NOIR cookies are waiting for you to experience. Come and elevate your sweet moments with us.
